amendment.description: An amendment to reduce funding for FAA operations by $3 million and increase funding for Facilities and Equipment by a similar amount.
amendment.purpose: Amendment transfers $3 million within the FAA to develop an integrated cybersecurity testbed to evaluate and certify all NextGen and National Airspace systems.

vote.text: On agreeing to the LoBiondo amendment (A010) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the LoBiondo amendment (A010) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A010) offered by Mr. LoBiondo.
